subject: Re: [junit] Problems using @BeforeClass with parallel methods
msgSnippet: ... We re here. The plugin does little more than scan the classpath and forward to JUnitCore, so I think Musa has the correct solution. The provider code,
messageBody:
on., 09.02.2011 kl. 09.35 -0500, skrev David Saff:
>
> Gili,
>
> I'm not sure about the implementation of the maven surefire plugin.
> There might be a maven expert on this list who knows more. You might
> also want to try the maven list.

We're here. The plugin does little more than scan the classpath and
forward to JUnitCore, so I think Musa has the correct solution.

The provider code, which is not long, can be seen here;
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/maven/surefire/trunk/surefire-providers/surefire-junit47/src/main/java/org/apache/maven/surefire/junitcore/JUnitCoreProvider.java?view=markup


Kristian
